p: A total of 14 articles with 14 records and a sample size of 10,844 reported co-infection of HCV/HBV in PWID and FSWs, of which 13 articles with 13 records were on PWID and one article with one record was on FSWs [ 31]. The overall prevalence of HCV/HBV in PWID was 3% (95% CI: 1â€“5%, p = 0.00, I 2 = 92.39%) ( Supplementary Figure S11, Table 2).
